title: INTERIOR DESIGN AND VIEW OF THE EIFFEL TOWER
body:
QR Code Link to This Post


This lovely studio apartment is entirely redone and located on the 2nd floor (with elevator) of a modern building.

You shall be immediately captivated by this apartment's decidedly modern style.

The vast room has a comfortable double bed. There is a built-in sofa 170 cm long and 80 cm wide that can, if necessary, sleep one child.

A LCD TV, iPhone/iPod dock and wireless Internet access are available for your utmost comfort. All this to enjoy after a meal prepared in the adjacent opan plan kitchen. Unless you prefer going out onto the balcony, from where on your left, you can enjoy a view of the Eiffel Tower!

Finally, the bathroom is equipped with a superb Italian shower just perfect to enjoy a relaxing moment after a long day visiting Paris.

This lovely studio apartment will be your favorite place in Paris both for business travel and leisure!
